title: Beautiful ornamental blackletter...
content:
Hey everyone..

Just curious about this beautiful piece of typography.  
Be grateful if someone could shed some light over the origins of this work. Typeface, swashes, designer etc.

It is a boxset of classic operas on tape. Published by Readers Digest!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102212731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1509_4006.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102212731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1511_4266.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121102212731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1514_4719.jpg)
author: Gregers™

comments.content:
Any date on this?

I would imagine it is custom, maybe based in type but heavily amended.

Michael
The only thing i can find, is a copyrigt note in the accompanying booklet that says 1978.
